response.overview: Jeevan son of Sujatha studying for degree. He is always dreaming about to be an actor. His friend Ratheesh introduced a man named Sankar to Jeevan, is a relative of Ratheesh. Sankar himself introduced as an assistant director in cinema and he said he is going to direct a cinema independently soon. He offering Jeevan a chance to become. Hero of his movie, but he asked money 2 lakhs for the films pooja. Jeevan’s friend requested his mother for money and she pledged the document of her house in a private bank and she gave money to Sankar. Later Jeevan realised that Sankar cheated him. A famous Film Director coming to police station in relation with a case of his son. SI Vinayakan demanding a chance for Jeevan in his next movie. For releasing his son Vishwanathan agreed SI Vinayakan’s demand. So Jeevan getting a chance to act in Viswanathan’s new movie. There ends the movie.
response.title: MADE IN TRIVANDRAM
